title: pre-trained models run errors
body:
I downloaded the pre-training model to see the effect of the model. Instead of generating flist file, I directly tested it, and the following error occurred：

python test.py  --checkpoints ./checkpoints/places2  --input ./examples/places2/images  --mask ./examples/places2/masks --output ./checkpoints/results --model 3

Loading EdgeModel generator...
Loading InpaintingModel generator...

start testing...

loading error: ./examples/places2/images/places2_01.png
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "/home/fanming_maming_cs/fm/edge-connect-master/src/dataset.py", line 41, in __getitem__
    item = self.load_item(index)
  File "/home/fanming_maming_cs/fm/edge-connect-master/src/dataset.py", line 83, in load_item
    return self.to_tensor(img), self.to_tensor(img_gray), self.to_tensor(edge), self.to_tensor(mask)
  File "/home/fanming_maming_cs/fm/edge-connect-master/src/dataset.py", line 155, in to_tensor
    img_t = F.to_tensor(img).float()
  File "/root/miniconda3/envs/edge-connect/lib/python3.6/site-packages/torchvision/transforms/functional.py", line 71, in to_tensor
    img = img.view(pic.size[1], pic.size[0], nchannel)
RuntimeError: shape '[256, 256, 1]' is invalid for input of size 262144

Please help to check if there are any mistakes. Thank you！
